Description_lang: Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and damage for $d, but during that time you cannot attack, move, or cast spells.$?a382292[While inside Ice Block, you heal for ${$382292s1*10}% of your maximum health over the duration.][]Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for $41425d.
AuraDescription_lang: Immune to all attacks and damage.Cannot attack, move, or use spells.
